title: Publishes a gap event
description: Publishes event when the gap in transaction sequence is detected

tenantId.description: Tenant ID of the missing transaction

businessUnitId.description: Business Unit ID of the missing transaction

missingTransactionId.description: ID of the missing transaction (comes from `previous-transaction-id` header)

nextTransactionId.description: ID of transaction following the missing transaction (comes from `transaction-id` header)
